name: Ian OS
short_description: Ian OS is a linux Distro that was created by me and is only available for 32 bit right now. Ian OS was created through SUSE Studio. Credits go to SUSE Studio Creator and my friends and family who were very nice in helping me test and code the operating system. NOTE: IT IS ALPHA, THE OS IS PROVIDED AS IS NO WARRENTY IS INCLUDED OR IS PROVIDED REPEATING AGAIN THE OS IS AS IS AND DOES NOT PROVIDE ANY WARRENTY OF ANY KIND IT IS YOUR OWN SOLE DESCRETION TO USE THE OS ALSO IF WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND USING VIRTUALBOX FOR THIS OPERATING SYSTEM TO AVOID ANY ISSUES OR USE A TEST COMPUTER PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS OS AS A PRIMARY OS YET. THANKS
